sentences.english: All sorts of mutational damage to animals' DNA would have occurred.

sentences.english: After resistant exercise, the calcium secretion in urine is increased and urine deoxy- pyridinoline is decreased.

sentences.english: DNA is the short form of deoxyribonucleic acid .
